about_the_game:
The digital art collection for Perky Little Things includes a lot of in-game and unused artwork in high resolution.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files. To quickly access these files right-click Perky Little Things in your Steam library and select "Properties". From there select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
